original_text:
My days are swifter than a weaver's shuttle
    and come to their end without hope.
korean_text: 나의 날은 베틀의 북보다 빠르니 희망 없이 보내는구나

sentences.original_text: My days are swifter than a weaver's shuttle
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 날들은 베틀의 북보다 더 빠르니

sentences.original_text: and come to their end without hope.
